QuoteSettings.name: QuoteSettings
QuoteSettings.label: Quote Settings
QuoteSettings.description: Represents QuoteSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableQuote.description: enable Quote field of QuoteSettings metadata component.

enableQuotesWithoutOppEnabled.description: enable Quotes Without Opp Enabled field of QuoteSettings metadata component.
